enhanced_posts.text:
* One is reminded of the courtesy port call made in 2005 by HMS Spartan to Rio de Janeiro.

Allowing the public to view the Dry Deck Shelter (DDS) on her quarterdeck was a not-so-subtle post-Falklands War reminder to the navy of Brazil’s neighbour Argentina of the […] 

[Original post on mas.to]

enhanced_posts.text:
theconversation.com/from-printin...

Swap the printing press for social media, and it’s déjà vu: viral nonsense, fearmongering, and people getting destroyed for clicks. Same con, different century—only now the pitchforks are digital, and the publishers are billionaires with algorithms.

#trump #maga

enhanced_posts.text:
#JeffreyEpstein #GhislaineMaxwell #Trump #Pedophile #Paedophile #MeToo #ChurchToo
Back when I was on Twitter I followed alot of sexual abuse survivors & they always reminded us that media coverage of abusers can be very triggering & encouraged us to take breaks & use self care. Take care of you. 💙💙

enhanced_posts.text: Erika McEntarfer, hoofd van het Amerikaanse CBS, is door Donald #Trump ontslagen nadat ze teleurstellende cijfers over de  ontwikkeling vd werkgelegenheid had gepubliceerd. Een oud idee: Margaret Thatcher zette het mes in het Engelse CBS om te voorkomen dat de oppositie zijn kritiek kon onderbouwen.
